attributes.action: Create a compulsory DNA Database for all UK based persons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At birth, every person born within UK borders to be added to DNA database and then every person entering UK to be swabbed and added to database.  Systematic addition of all people being arrested or attending GPs or hospitals for treatment to have DNA captured until database is complete for all UK based persons.
